views.markdown:
## Extra Lotus Dark Icons
Lotus Dark has stopped receiving updates and I created many extra icons for it. I decided to make the icons publicaly available through this package. While you can totally install this without buying Lotus Dark it really won't work all that well so I recommend you also buy Lotus Dark from the Packix repository.

### Includes Over 300 Custom Icons
Check the "Supported Icons" tab for the full list

**Add new icons for**:
 - Flipboard 
 - Jabra Sound+ 
 - Notebook 
 - Jaybird MySound 
 - Life360 
 - Wear OS
